column4: from the breezy livecd, i'm trying to resize an ntfs partition with gparted, but it keeps failing.  command-line output says /dev/hdc is read-only (cdrom) and "unable to open /dev/mapper/casper-cow", whatever that is...  is there no way to resize this ntfs partition so i can install breezy?

from the breezy livecd, i'm trying to resize an ntfs partition with gparted, but it keeps failing.  command-line output says /dev/hdc is read-only (cdrom) and "unable to open /dev/mapper/casper-cow", whatever that is...  is there no way to resize this ntfs partition so i can install breezy?
